name: Casual Pursuit
description:
The police are after you, how long can you escape them! Race through a randomly generated 3d world using a variety of vehicles constantly trying to stay one step ahead of the police but be careful, they have a few tricks up their sleeves.

Casual Pursuit is a casual action game where you race around trying to rob armored cars and banks while trying to avoid being caught by the police, all the while making sure you don't run out of fuel. Earn bonus points for each police vehicle destroyed and try and beat your high score.

Features

  • Randomly generated 3d world.
  • Collect in game money to unlock vehicles, each with their own performance and handling.
  • Simple low poly style.
